Glaceau smartwater is made by using evaporated spring water then we condense the vapour and then add just the right amount of electrolytes before bottling.

Löfbergs ICE - Cold Coffee Drink

Latte Macchiatto Flavour

 

The Ice coffee ICE Latte Macchiato is a milk based beverage with coffee made from natural and organic ingredients. Furthermore, the coffee and sugar contained in the drink is FairTrade certified.

 

The unique packaging solution, CartoCan®, can be sorted as recyclable paper based packaging. Löfbergs ICE Latte Macchiato has a mild flavour of espresso and is a great drink to enjoy whenever you want a refreshing and invigorating drink. If you prefer a stronger coffee flavour, try our ICE Espresso, the second drink in the ICE product line. 

 

Löfbergs ice coffee kan be stored in room temperature and is best served cold. Shake the can before serving. The coffein content of a can of Löfbergs ICE is roughly equivalent to half a cup of coffee.

 

Contents:
Sold in multiples of 12 cans (12x 230 ml).

 

 

Storage:

Best stored in room temperature or refrigeraged. Serve chilled over ice.

 

Packaging:

Cartocan®, an environmentally friendly and patented packaging, recycled as paper based packaging.

AROMO SUMATRA

Senseo ® Compatible Coffee Pods

100% Single Origin Sumatran Coffee

 

A true Sumatra Mandheling Coffee Pod for your Senseo Coffee Pad machine.  Buy this when you just can’t get enough of a good thing! If this coffee had a health warning- we’d only end up drinking more of it – simply fab!

Our fuller pods at 9g of coffee per pod give you a longer stronger brew. Sumatran coffee origin senseo® coffee pods in a box of 100

TASTING NOTES: Big – Bold – Brutal and Rich! Rustic fermented notes of black cherry, brandy and aromatic hickory.

 

• Box of 100 Premium Aromo coffee pods for use with SENSEO® machines
• Each contains 9g of fine handroasted Sumatran coffee
• Most Senseo pods are 7g so ours at 9g contain 28% more coffee per pod
• No mess and makes a perfect cup every time
• Each pod is individually sealed for freshness
• Sameday dispatch and express courier delivery

 

Box of 100 Premium Aromo Coffee 62mm coffee pods that are Senseo® compatible Filter Coffee Pods for use in Senseo® coffee machines, which use single serve pods. This is pre-ground coffee contained in a paper pod which is then sealed in a foil outer pack. No mess, no fuss and it saves time and effort.

Forget grinding coffee beans and tamping and will consistently deliver great cream and a smooth taste.

This is the easiest way to make a perfect cup of filter based coffee every time.

 

Ideal for regular coffees, Americano, Cappuccinos & Lattes. Aromo coffee pads are not made by Senseo. These are our own coffee pods that are suitable for using in a machine such as a Philips senseo or Kenwwod Mokabista coffee pad machine.

*‘Senseo’ is the Registered Trade Mark name of Sara Lee / DE N.V and any use of the term is an indication of product use and compatibility only. SENSEO® is a registered trademark. column13: Cafelat knock box classic used for style and space
column14:
Cafelat Knockbox Classic

The cafelat knockbox classic is designed by using stainless steel and an angled shape to ensure the user has an all round great product. The stainless steel ensures durability of the product whilst the angled shape helps assist the user by becoming a guard stopping splashes and coffee from spilling everywhere. 

The knockbox consists of a round stainless steel tub, which is 15cm in diameter. The front part of the box (12cm high) is lower than the back part (18cm) so that it can act as a splash guard to prevent errant grounds from soupy pucks flying everywhere.  The box is small enough for the home enthusiast but also large enough for low to medium volume coffee stores.


With every box comes the following:

 

  • 1 Cafelat knock box
  • 1 Rubber gasket
  • 2 Knock bars to ensure you have a spare

 

Key Product Features:

  • Stainless steel ensuring longer usage
  • Small design to stop from cluttering
  • 1 years parts only warranty

column8: MOMA Porridge Pots - Coconut & Chia x 12 Pots
column13: Here’s one for the super foodies. MOMA’s Coconut & Chia Porridge Pots are made using a delicious blend of jumbo and fine gluten free oats and coconut milk powder, making it both gluten and dairy free. Plus there's no added sugar!
column14:
MOMA COCONUT & CHAI

GLUTEN FREE PORRIDGE POTS

 

Not only are all our porridge's gluten free, but we've now gone an introduced a DAIRY FREE option...meet MOMA's Coconut & Chia Porridge. Made using the same legendary blend of jumbo and fine gluten free oats, it also contains coconut milk powder to create an intensely creamy and satisfying taste that will leave you going nuts for coconuts. It's also jam-packed full of coconut pieces and those tiny titans of nutrition, Chia Seeds. What's more there's no added sugar and it's also a source of protein. Now that's what we call a porridge that packs a punch!

 

Whether you're lactose intolerant, want to cut down on dairy or simply cant get enough of coconuts then this porridge is the one for you. All you need to do is add boiling water to the fill line, sit back for a few minutes and imagine you're relaxing on a Caribbean beach and voila, it's ready. Now, we can't quite promise the bit about the beach, but this authentic coconut taste will be sure to transport you somewhere pretty close!

 

So go on and pick up a box of 12 Coconut & Chia Porridge Pots for just £13.49. If you're looking for healthy breakfast options then why not pop some of our Plain (No Added Sugar) Pots and Sachets in your basket too. Both also contain no added sugar and you'll qualify for free delivery too, bargain!

column13: Blendtec EZ600 Blender & 1 Jugs Package - PRICE GUARANTEE Blendtec Commercial Blender - Low Volume Smoothie Maker
column14:
BLENDTEC EZ600 BLENDER

FORMALLY BLENDTEC XPRESS COMMERCIAL BLENDER

WE GUARANTEE TO BEAT EVERY BLENDTEC PRICE*

 

Ready to start a blended-drink program?  The EZ600 blender is a great way to start.

 

Incorporating features of more expensive machines, the EZ600 Blender delivers heavy duty blending power and performance, at an affordable price.

 

The powerful 1560watt / 6.5amp motor has 30 pre-programmed blending cycles available, select the blend cycles best suited to your needs and assign them to the keypad.

 

Blendtec's exclusive technology makes blending simple: when you push a cycle button, the blender automatically speeds up and slows down, then shuts off when the cycle is complete.  This means staff can attend to customers or complete other tasks whilst a drink is blending to perfection, which, saves time and labour costs. 

 

There are no hassles with timers, cumbersome buttons and knobs. Every Blendtec blender motor comes with a flat, sealed touchpad. The jar design reduces sound associated with normal jar operations and allows for wet or dry blends.  Many other blenders on the market require one jar for wet blends and a different jar for dry blends. 

 

The Blendtec unique square jar design and wing-tipped blade pulls the mixture down through the blade, micronising ingredients for the smoothest texture possible.  You want your ingredients to blend, not just spin around in circles.  Blendtec's square jar forces your ingredients from the blade, up the jar sides and then straight back down to the blade again.

 

Blendtec's commercial grade motor and patented jar features eliminate the need for stir sticks or tampers.  With a wide base for fast food removal and an ergonomic handle the jar makes food preparation fast and simple.

 

The easy to use one-touch keypad activation and the compact size of this blender, combined with the durability and functionality of the FourSide Jars, make the EZ600 Blender, the best value for any business with a low volume demand.

 

  • Custom Blending on a Budget

 

 

Features include:

 

    • Motor: 3.0 peak horsepower, 13 amp/120v or 6.5 amp/240v available
    • Recommended daily blends: 50
    • Program cycles: Small, Medium, Large + Pulse
    • Profiles: Smoothies, Coffee, Milkshake
    • Colors: Black
    • Warranty: See your local dealer for warranty information
    • Certification: See your local dealer for warranty information

 

Customizable Cycles

The EZ 600 can be programmed specifically for smoothies, coffee beverages, or milkshakes, providing consistently smooth blends for drinks of all kinds.

 

One-Touch, Simple Controls

Presets for Small, Medium, and Large beverages blend with a single touch and shut off automatically. A Pulse button provides a quick burst of needed speed and power.

 

 

Powerful, Ultra High-speed Motor

The EZ 600 boasts a 3.0 peak horsepower motor, one of the largest in the industry. It quickly and effortlessly blends tough ingredients like ice and frozen fruit to a perfectly smooth consistency each and every time.

 

Dimensions

H: 15.0” (38.1 cm)
D 8.0” (20.3 cm)
W: 7.0” (17.7 cm)

Weight

7.1 lbs (3.2 kg)

column13: Is a case of PureGusto convection roasted coffee a little too much, or do you want to try before you commit to a whole case. Here you can buy a single bag of our coffee.
column14:
PureGusto Coffee In Smaller Packs

If you cant manage a box or want to try before your commit to a case, this is for you...

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…

            “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

           

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

 

Benefits Of Convection Roasting.

In our constant pursuit for quality we have expertly sourced a traditional Mao Feng for Birchall Green Tea. Its dark green leaves brighten when infused to produce a shimmering, clear, yellow colour with an initial smoothness, which evolves into the more complex, fragrant notes that characterise Mao Feng.

 

Recommended Brew Time;

  • 2-5 minutes

 

Ingredients;

  • Mao Feng Green Tea

Intuitive operation via self-explanatory touchscreen display

Clean lines and high-quality materials with outstanding workmanship

Ingenious dual spout with fine foam technology

column13: The speed function and time-saving, intuitive operation make the GIGA X8 Professional ideal for use in catering. A large water tank and coffee grounds container allow for flexible and mobile use.
column14:
JURA GIGA X8

GIGA X8 SPEED PRO

 

THE SPEEDY PROFESSIONAL JURA COFFEE MACHINE 

The high-performance GIGA X8 Professional with its elegant finish comes with a unique speed function, allowing it to prepare perfect coffee in record time. The optimally extracted coffee is mixed with hot water inside the machine by means of an extra bypass. Absolutely no flavour is lost during the process.

 

The speed function and time-saving, intuitive operation make the GIGA X8 Professional ideal for use in catering. A large water tank and coffee grounds container allow for flexible and mobile use.

 

Extended waiting times are eradicated and at peak capacity, it can create eighty cups in thirty minutes thanks to the implementation of an extra bypass system. This third bypass also ensures that the beans are never over and under extracted, resulting in a better tasting cup every time.

 

With the X8 Professional you are in complete control: Able to create 29 drinks, each one of these selections – as well as the home menu – can be customised and adapted to suit the occasion or customer.

 

  • 29 Customisable selections – Offer an unrivalled amount of choice with just one machine. Rename and alter default options to give you complete control.
  • Two drinks at once – Prepare two lattes, cappuccinos or latte macchiatos at the press of a button.
  • Three thermoblocks – The presence of a third thermoblock enables the X8 Professional to brew the perfect coffee and blistering speed. You won’t be waiting around.
  • Intuitive display – A ball bearing mounted rotary switched alongside a clearly readable TFT display and a customisable menu, means that the operating process is very simple.
  • Two Ceramic disc grinders – These long-lasting ceramic discs cut grinding times by 75% and guarantee a quick, precise and defined grind.
  • Two energy saving modes
  • TUV certified cleaning cycle
  • Switch-on and switch-off times can be specified
  • Three high performance 15bar pumps
  • Uses fresh beans and ingredients
  • Manual fill version

 

Drinks per day

Up to 200 cups of coffee per day

 

Technologies

The extra hot water capacity provided by the third thermoblock is essential to the machine's efficiency, enabling it to brew the perfect coffee at record speed. The hot water is added to the freshly brewed coffee through a bypass line and the two are mixed inside the machine.

Speed Function

The speed function can be adapted to suit specific requirements. 29 different products, as well as the start screen, can be individually programmed to suit the occasion or customer. For instance, products can be renamed and arranged to the user's liking on the display. Two ceramic disc grinders guarantee quick, precise and even grinding for many years to come and cut previous grinding times by 75%.

 

Cleaning/Hygiene

As well as being easy to operate and programme, the machine is designed to be very easy to care for. The integrated rinsing, cleaning and descaling programmes reduce the effort involved to a minimum and guarantee TÜV-certified hygiene.

 

Customisable

With a wide selection of accessories including a cup warmer, milk cooler, coffee grounds disposal function set, drip drain set and interface for accounting systems, as well as an attractive range of storage and presentation units, it is possible to create a complete coffee solution tailored to your specific requirements.

GIGA Value Protection

JURA’s high standards of quality also extend to customer service. Every GIGA X8c Professional comes with GIGA Value Protection, providing maintenance for a professional automatic coffee machine for 25 months or 45 000 cups.

 

This unique service package for professional equipment is offered exclusively by JURA. After 9 and 18 months, our service technician will arrange a date to service the unit at no additional cost.

column13: Pallo steamy wanda cleaning tool
column14:
Pallo Steamy Wanda Cleaning Tool

 

Out of sight, out of mind, that's your steam wands inner walls. Sure you can purge after steaming milk, but did you know that ineral deposits on the inner walls can prevent a complete purge? As the machine cools down, a partial vacuum is formed in the system which can result in the residue getting sucked up toeards and eventually into the boiler.

With our steamy wanda it has special heat resistant bristles which last onger and come in two sizes to fit 6mm and 7.25mm wands. Its unique rounded tip helps prevent scratching and gouginh and the design is great for cleaning portafilter sprouts and other nooks and crannies.

column13: The ENA 9 is Juras slimmest ever one touch speciality household coffee machine. It offers a versatile and flexible selection of options to please even the most discerning coffee lovers taste.
column14:
JURA ENA 9

Jura Ena 9 Black Aroma+ Coffee Machine

 

Coffee drinkers can now experience new dimensions of pleasure with the second generation Jura ENA 9 fully automatic coffee machine. This popular model now features a new Aroma+ grinder which grinds your favourite choice of coffee beans twice as fast and guarantees the highest coffee quality every time. An Aroma Boost function delivers an extra coffee coffee kick when you need it most.

 

Your favourite speciality drinks such as cappuccino and latte macchiato are produced at the touch of a button without having to move the cup, allowing you to effortlessly enjoy barista quality drinks in the comfort of your home. Innovative fine foam technology produces a crown of soft, seductive milk foam.

 

The award winning design of the successful Jura ENA 9 is further enhanced with a high quality, discreet black finish. The chrome plated, height-adjustable dual spout presents the results perfectly.

 

  • Coffee specialities such as latte macchiato and cappuccino at the touch of a button without having to move the cup.
  • Achieve perfect aroma with the new and efficient Aroma+ conical grinder, adjustable to your liking.
  • Use pre-ground coffee in addition to fresh beans to experiment with new blends or accommodate different individual preferences.
  • Innovative fine-foam technology for feather-light milk foam with a seductive, creamy consistency.
  • Height-adjustable dual spout with integrated fine-foam milk frother for optimal pouring distance and minimal splashing (75 - 125 mm / 3 and 5 inch).
  • Seduce the senses with an Aroma Boost function when you need a coffee kick!
  • Access 6 different products with only a single touch of a button
  • Super slimline design can blend into any kitchen - 23.8 cm (9 inches) wide

 

Aroma+grinder now twice as fast

By perfecting the cutting angle inside the grinding cone, the JURA engineers have managed to increase efficiency significantly. As a result, the perfect aroma can now be achieved in all its natural fullness in half the grinding time. So now coffee lovers can enjoy pure and perfect coffee indulgence with less preparation time and less noise.

 

The powder chute for ground coffee can be used for additional coffee varieties such as a decaffeinated blend.

 

Aroma+ grinder now twice as fast

 By perfecting the cutting angle inside the grinding cone, the JURA engineers have managed to increase efficiency significantly. As a result, the perfect aroma can now be achieved in all its natural fullness in half the grinding time. So now coffee lovers can enjoy pure and perfect coffee indulgence with less preparation time and less noise. The powder chute for ground coffee can be used for additional coffee varieties such as a decaffeinated blend.

 

 

Coffee kick

The Aroma Boost function provides a natural, refreshing energy boost when you need it. At the touch of a button, Aroma Boost freshly grinds the maximum amount of coffee and extracts it in the variable brewing unit under optimum conditions to create an extra-strong espresso or lungo.

 

 

Ingenious dual spout with fine foam technology

The dual spout, height-adjustable on a continuous scale, is equipped with state-of-the-art fine foam technology. It produces a soft light-as-air milk foam of an irresistible consistency for the perfect cappuccino and is easy to dismantle and clean. Two separate pipe systems for coffee and milk guarantee perfect results and hygiene.

SEASONAL SYRUP KIT

EXCLUSIVE to PUREGUSTO 

 

Our seasonal syrup kit isn't skewed to a single brand like other companies, our syrup kit is one that offers a diverse and exciting range of seasonal flavours to excite your staff and customers alike, from our one of a kind Christmas Pudding Syrup, to modern classics such as Pumpkin Spice (a flavour no cafe should be without right now!).

 

From lattes to hot chocolates, a simple double pump will transform your milk latte, to a pumpkin spiced latte... for this transformation it costs less than 10p but your margin can increase by up to a whopping 25% simply by creating a drink...

TOP SYRUP TIP

Don't just add a line to your menu... "add a syrup for 20p"

This is dull and tired... be creative!

Here's a couple of ideas for you...

  • 2 shots of toffee apple into steamed milk makes a fab toffee apple latte - combine the coffee and syrup with your favourite chocolate and - bam you have a toffee apple mocha.

  • 2 shots of Pumpkin Spice Syrup into a latte or mocha becomes a Pumpkin Spice Latte / Pumpkin Spice Mocha Choc

Columbian coffee origin senseo coffee pods in a box of 100

column13: Our most traditional Porridge blend: a mixture of jumbo and fine gluten free oats, low fat milk powder and a sprinkling of raw cane sugar in handy 70g pots.
column14:
MOMA PLAIN ORIGINAL PORRIDGE POTS

 

MOMA's most traditional Porridge blend: a mixture of jumbo and fine gluten free oats, low fat milk powder and a sprinkling of raw cane sugar in handy large 70g pots (Bigger Than Most Brands Around 60g)

MOMA knows there's a few of you out there that just can't get enough of your old faithful porridge, that's why we produce our MOMA Plain Porridge. It uses the traditional blend of jumbo and fine gluten free oats with just a pinch of raw cane sugar to get that hearty sweet taste that we know and love.

 

To make it convenient and simple too, all of our pots come with low fat milk powder, so that all you need to do is add a splash of hot water, wait a few minutes for your oats to cook and then your porridge is ready to dig into.

 

MOMA Plain Porridge is the perfect base if you're fond of jazzing up your breakfast. Why not add some fresh raspberries with a sprinkling of pumpkin and chia seeds, for a tasty porridge full of crunch and bursting with juicy flavours.

 

Pick up a box of our MOMA Plain Porridge today, 12 pots for only £13.49. Why not keep a box at home and another one in your desk at work - we wouldn't want you to be caught short now would we?

column13: Maintain beverages at their optimal temperature longer with Dart insulated foam cups.
column14:
DART FOAM CUPS

No one wants to drink a room temperature cup of coffee, and foam acts as an insulator and keeps coffee warm for a long time. Plus, foam cups do not get hot like other kinds of disposables, and this makes them easier on the hands. Foam cups can be recycled into insulation and many other fine products, and Dart Corporation is proud to be environmentally conscious. They are the recipient of the 2013 EPS Industry Alliance Excellence in EPS Recycling Award.

Maintain beverages at their optimal temperature longer with Dart insulated foam cups.

 

Not only do foam cups keep beverages at their proper serving temperature on the inside, they keep hands comfortable on the outside. Hot or cold, insulated foam delivers drinks the way they were meant to be. 

Available in 7, 10 & 12 ounce sizes, small drink cups are ideal for tea, coffee, cappuccino, hot drinking chocolate, juice, or soda.

column8: PureGusto MAMA CATA - Great Taste Award - ESE Pods x 100
column13: MAMA CATA is a GREAT TASTE AWARD winning coffee that has been designed to bring gourmet coffee's to the masses.
column14:
PANAMA * MAMA CATA *

ESE COFFEE PODS

 

2015 GREAT TASTE AWARD WINNER

 

Its time for us to spill the beans, if you excuse the pun. We've been keeping this exceptional coffee under wraps for sometime now, we secretly submitted our latest Single Origin coffee to the great taste awards 2015 to ensure the judges agreed with us, that MAMA CATA is one of the finest coffee's we have ever tasted!

 

Not only has this exceptional coffee won a 2015 great taste award, it has also been endorsed by the speciality coffee assocation.

 

Evoking sweet spicey notes and an baked apple sweet bitterness, this medium to dark roasted coffee is hand selected and roasted to shear perfection in our state of the art unique convection roasting oven, right here in the UK. The exceptional quality of this coffee must be tasted to appreciate its complex notes oaky notes and fruity sweetness on the palate.

 

Graded a whopping 95 of a possible 100 by the independant coffee review. This is a true gourmet coffee, with substantial body. We roast this to just before second crack which lends itself perfectly for a wide range of coffee equipment, from traditional espresso right through to bean to cup or even french press (cafetiere).

 

AGTRON: 49/65

AROMA 9/10

ACIDITY: 9/10

BODY: 9/10

FLAVOUR: 9/10

AFTERTASTE 9:/10

 

PureGusto Coffee ESE Pods

Not all coffees are one and the same, more importantly not all roasters are equal either!

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…   “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

          

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

 

 

 

*Approx contents based on weight of pods.

column13: A world first: P.E.P. from JURA Pulse extraction process produces the perfect espresso creating expert quality cappuccino and latte drinks also
column14:
JURA Z6

Jura Impressa Z6 Coffee Machine

 

For the Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.©), innovation leader JURA took its inspiration from the world’s best baristas. The result is a revolutionary technology that optimises the extraction time, allowing even short speciality coffees like ristretto and espresso to be prepared with an intensity and breadth of aromas like never before.

 

 

The Z6 moves into completely new territory, taking the automatic speciality coffee machine to the next level. The state-of-the-art generation of coffee machines is an impressive showcase of Swiss innovation. It achieves a brand new standard of quality across the whole spectrum of speciality coffees, from the short, fiery ristretto to the popular, mellow flat white.

 

The purest quality espresso

JURA has perfected the complete brewing process for ristretto and espresso. That’s why the Z6 is able to prepare coffee to the same standard as the best coffee bars. The Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.©) brings out every nuance of the Aroma.

 

Result: possibly the best espresso of all time – at the touch of a button.

 

 

Crowning ceremony

For in-vogue speciality coffees finished with milk and milk foam, the crowning ceremony is expertly performed by the Z6 at the touch of a button. The machine switches from milk to milk foam fully automatically. As a feature making its world debut in domestic coffee machines, the milk temperature can be varied according to personal taste.

 

 

Intelligent Water System (I.W.S.®) for automatic filter detection

The Z6 is the first automatic speciality coffee machine to feature automatic filter detection thanks to modern RFID Technology. Using a filter has never been easier, more effective or more reliable.

 

 

Refined functionality

The Z6 packs incredible performance into compact dimensions. All the control elements are conveniently accessible on the front. The removal of the water tank and refilling of the bean container also take place conveniently from the front.

 

The user can rename the different speciality coffees and position them on the start screen. There are no limits to the imagination. Maintenance is just as easy as preparing a coffee: one touch of a button is all that’s needed.

column13: GIGA 5 sets a new standard in performance, aesthetics and perfection for the coffee machine segment. Professional technology has found its way into the homes of people who demand the highest standards.
column14:
Jura GIGA 5

 

The Jura GIGA 5 adds a new dimension to the preparation of specialty coffee at home. With a range of features previously available only to commercial coffee makers used in professional catering outlets, the GIGA 5 is the first coffee machine in the world to allow customers to produce boutique style coffee from the comfort of their own home.

 

The caffè latte has been a classic in coffee circles for many years. However, due to the technical challenge of optimally blending milk and coffee during preparation in order to deliver them to the cup simultaneously, until now the perfect caffè latte has been the sole domain of professional coffee machines in upmarket catering establishments.

 

With the GIGA 5, Jura allows customers to enjoy the aromatic splendour of this staple drink in the comfort of their own home. With two flowmeters, two pumps and two heating systems to create the perfect blend of coffee and milk, and each cup topped with a milky crown of foam, the GIGA 5 brews coffee that is guaranteed to ensnare the senses long before it touches the lips.

 

The epitome of quality – doubled

With the combined power of two grinders, two heating systems, two pumps and two fluid systems, the machine prepares every speciality coffee to perfection.

 

 

Fast and quiet as a whisper

Two professional, virtually wear-free ceramic disc grinders with electronic adjustment guarantee precise, consistent grinding for years to come.

 

 

Milk and coffee – a perfect duet

The GIGA 5 is the first automatic coffee machine from JURA designed to prepare the perfect caffè latte. Its secret lies in the optimum mix of milk and coffee during preparation. The only way to achieve this is for the milk and coffee to flow into the cup at the same time. The GIGA 5 can prepare coffee and heat up milk simultaneously, a feature previously restricted to professional machines in the most elegant bars and restaurants. Finally, the coffee is topped with a crown of milk foam.

 

 

Create your speciality coffee in no time

The intuitive control concept with TFT display, Rotary Selection and easy-to-identify preparation buttons make it easy to create the beverage you want.

 

 

Plenty of air for optimum performance

Because the machine houses two powerful grinders, two pumps and two heating systems in a small space, a lot of heat and steam are produced. Heat is automatically guided out of the machine by the striking, adjustable Venti Ports, which also supply fresh air, working harmoniously with the electronic ventilation system.

 

 

Barista specialities

Now you can become a professional barista in a flash. The recipes for 12 tempting and original coffee creations are selected with the Rotary Switch. The GIGA 5 uses text and pictures to guide you through the preparation process - so you can treat yourself and your guests to some delicious coffee creations! A truly pleasurable experience for the palate – and a treat for the eyes too.

column13: Qualita Rossa is made from a unique blend of Robusta and Arabica beans to produce an aromatic, smooth, well rounded flavour.
column14:
Lavazza Qualita Rossa Coffee Beans

 

The UK’s biggest espresso coffee brand, perfect for drinking at anytime of the day.


Qualita Rossa is made from a unique blend of Robusta and Arabica beans to produce an aromatic, smooth, well rounded flavour. 


A versatile blend, great with or without milk which makes superb Cappuccinos and Lattes. Also available in beans for you to grind at home. Lavazza Qualità Rossa is the authentic Italian blend, evenly roasted to produce a coffee with a rich and intense taste and exceptional body and aroma.

 

Lavazza Qualità Rossa for that truly Italian coffee moment

Ample, rich and spicy – our popular espresso blend for cappuccinos and latte macchiatos brings you the authentic taste of Italy. The Lavazza Qualità Rossa is cultivated with love. Its preparation is a ritual of perfection that provides coffee connoisseurs with a truly Italian coffee recharging moment. The reward: A caffè that is rich and full like no other and with every sip exudes the passion with which it was produced.

 

A velvety espresso blend for latte macchiato

The Lavazza Qualità Rossa, an Italian favourite for more than a century, is one of the most traditional products offered by the coffee masters of Lavazza – a true coffee classic! Its creation is the result of our ceaseless passion for producing outstanding premium espresso blends that provide energy, enjoyment to our customers every single day. Whether brewed by hand, made with an espresso machine or with a coffee filter; the Lavazza Qualità Rossa is suitable for any preparation method. For maximum enjoyment, however, we recommend using the blend as a basis for a cappuccino or latte macchiato.

column14:
Jura Glass Milk Container

 

Beautifully Practical

 

The glass milk container makes an indispensable addition for all coffee lovers who like to spoil their family and guests from time to time with a trendy flat white, latte macchiato or cappuccino.

 

Perfectly harmonised with the typical lines of JURA design, it is easy to store in the refrigerator and connect up to the coffee machine as and when required.  The milk lance is connected at just the right height to allow the milk to be drawn in and frothed with ease.

 

The container holds 0.5 litres and is dishwasher-safe.

 

 

The quick and easy way to enjoy the perfect cup of coffee

 

The milk pipe is connected to the cover and preparation can be started. The simple plug connections ensure that the route the milk follows is totally clean. The outer area of the milk pipe, which is often dirty, never comes into direct contact with the milk.

 

High-quality, perfectly hygienic materials

 

The high-quality glass container and the stainless steel milk lance are ideal for storing milk as they are taste-neutral.

 

 

Easy to store

The glass milk container is very manageable and can be easily stored in the refrigerator door.

 

Easy to clean

Since they have a smooth surface and are suitable for dishwashers, glass and stainless steel are nice and easy to clean

column13: Tis specially selected 100% Arabica coffee bean blend is combination of FairTrade Certified Pure Arabicas from aroundthe world
column14:
FAIRTRADE MILANO FILTER COFFEE

100% ARABICA COFFEE

PRODUCED BY AUTHORISED FAIRTRADE LICENCE HOLDER - BEWARE NON LICENCED RETAILERS

 

 

Our milano filter coffee, is a 100% arabica coffee blend of no less than 3 specially selected origin coffee's, this unique blend is bursting with brilliant aromas, this bean delivers a superb balance of flavour and body.

 

From premium origins such as Colombia, Nicaragua not to mention premium mysore coffee's this strategically formed and perfectly balanced cup will not dissapoint, Its medium roasting strength will not dissappoint and perfect for all day every day drinking...

 

PureGusto Coffee's

Not all coffees are one and the same, more importantly not all roasters are equal either!

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…   “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

          

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

column13: Cioccolato Suprema contains a whopping 25% cocoa solids, its a recipe inspired by Spanish drinking chocolates that are taking the nation by storm.
column14:
Cioccolato Suprema Hot Chocolate 

25% Cocoa Premium Chocolate Drink

 

PureGusto Cioccolato Suprema is a recipe inspired by spanish drinking chocolates that are taking the nation by storm, as with coffee, consumers are more and more aware of the quality of what it is they are actually drinking, furthermore they're discerning palates are looking to more premium and rich flavours than those standard chocolate drinks from an age ago.

 

With this in mind years ago our MD developed this rich, luxurious hot chocolate drink, still produced to the exact original recipe, this luxury chocolate drink is a true delight every single cup, first sip to the last...

 

At a whopping 25% pure cocoa content its not shy on the chocolate either! why not top with quality whipped cream, chocolate flakes or even our deliciously fluffy mini marshmallows to finish every cup off amazingly.

 

 

DIRECTIONS - Swirl 25g of cioccolato Suprema drinking chocolate into 200ml of milk - Heat using steam arm on your coffee machine until your desired temperature is reached, Make it thicken more by increasing the temperature further.

 

Have a blender... make a super frothy thick chocolate, simply follow the mixing instructions above and blend for around 20 seconds for a really bubbly chocolate drink.

column14:
BIRCHALL BREAKFAST TEA BAGS

 

Birchall Great Rift - Breakfast Blend - Great Taste 2015 Award Winning - Prism Tea Bags

 

We are very proud of our deliciously strong breakfast tea bursting with flavour, recently winning the highest accolade at the 2015 Great Taste Awards. Birchall Great Rift Tea is a unique English Breakfast blend, produced through five generations of Birchall Graham’s family.

 

It is sourced exclusively from estates across East Africa, from Rwanda through to the Great Rift Valley in Kenya, where the very best teas are to be found.


Birchall consider their signature black teas to be truly special and unique in the tea world and we’d like to tell you why. Our black teas are all sourced exclusively from the finest tea estates across East Africa, from Rwanda through to the Great Rift Valley in Kenya; this is generally considered to be where the very best teas are to be found.

 

This equatorial region’s altitude, high rainfall and rich volcanic soil provide the ideal conditions that are integral to growing tea of unparalleled flavour and taste. It really is perfection to a tea and we look forward to you enjoying it as much as we do.

MOMA’s Golden Syrup Porridge Pot is packed with flavour and hearty goodness. With a sprinkling of raw cane sugar and natural flavours, this is the perfect breakfast for those who like to start the morning with a sweet treat. Our MOMA Golden Syrup Porridge Pot uses a unique blend of jumbo and fine gluten free oats with low fat milk powder, for a distinctively creamy yet chunky texture.

 

For the perfect pot, add hot water from a recently boiled kettle to the fill line, wait 3 – 4 minutes and your MOMA Golden Syrup Porridge will be good to go. If you’re a fan of an extra crunch in your porridge, why not add some chia and linseeds?

 

Our MOMA Golden Syrup Porridge Pots come in a box of 12 for £13.49, however you might need to pick up a few as we’ve heard this is a favourite for all the family.

column8: Signature - Great Taste Award - Cafetiere Sachets
column13: Signature is exactly that, our highest quality blend, the staple of which we rank other coffee's against. Our own personal sign off to the coffee making world!
column14:
SIGNATURE CAFETIERE COFFEE

AWARD WINNING CAFETIERE COFFEE

 

PureGusto signature blend is our flagship coffee, as its name would suggest, our signature coffee blend, carefully blended using hand picked arabica coffee's from no less than 5 different single origins, this complex and sophisticated award winning blend is our own personal sign off to the coffee making world.

 

A sophisticated drinking coffee that shines from the first taste to its last, long thick crema and tantalising aromas finish every cup as, a true signature coffee blend, and in this format has been ground using our unique ground flat bed technoology to create a fantastic filter coffee blend.

 

5 x 100% single origin Arabica coffees, carefully blended and convection roasted to sweet, smooth & rich perfection...

 

PureGusto CAFETIERE Coffee's

Not all coffees are one and the same, more importantly not all roasters are equal either!

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…   “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Great Taste Awards 2014 Double Star & 2015 Star Winner!

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

          

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

Two precision grinders, an adjustable brewing unit and a huge choice of customizable programs guarantee you a cup of coffee exactly to your requirements, every single time.

column13: The Gaggia Deco is the latest commercial coffee machine from Gaggia which incorporates the legendary Gaggia style and history together with modern innovation such as adjustable pre-infusion timing and group head temperature control.
column14:
GAGGIA DECO

COMMERCIAL ESPRESSO MACHINE

 

The Gaggia Deco is the latest commercial coffee machine from Gaggia which incorporates the legendary Gaggia style and history together with modern innovation such as adjustable pre-infusion timing and group head temperature control.

 

One of the reasons behind the Deco's instant success has been in its popularity amonst pofessional Barista's. The Gaggia Deco has many additional features that make using this coffee machine a real pleasure: a testament to the time and thought put into the design of this coffee machine at Gaggia.

 

The back of the Gaggia Deco bears a large illuminated logo of the famous Gaggia brand, giving a neon style blue glow. The machine is just asking to be out on display where customers can see it and it will work hardest. This espresso machine will definitely make a statement of style and quality in any establishment.

 

The Gaggia Deco two group coffee machine has a 13 litre boiler with seperate heat exchangers. It is also equipped with turbo steam nozzles that steam foam milk quickly producing a really high silky latte milk or creamy cappuccino foam. Capable of steaming a 1 Litre of milk in 40 seconds!

 

Key Gaggia Deco Features;

  • Stainless steel boiler with removable flange for easy inspection, assures corrosion strength and doesn’t contaminate the water.
  • Autonomous heating system for each group head with electronic temperature control.
  • Timer for automatic On/Off control (only for the electronic model).
  • Profiled filter-holders for greater grip comfort.
  • Steam-pipe with integrated filter.
  • Multifunction display
  • The water inflow control valve for each group head, maneuverable by user. Subdivided Cup-holder grill
  • Back illumination

 

Available group sizes: 2 or 3

► Size (H x W x D) (2 group): 53.5 cm x 76.5 cm x 57 cm
► Size (H x W x D) (3 group): 53.5 cm x 98.5 cm x 57 cm

column13: Blendtec Commercial Blenders - Newly Renamed Blendtec Connoisseur Blender formerly the blendtec Q Series smoothie blender- High Volume Smoothie Blender - Perfect For Shake Bars, Cafe's Coffee Shops & Smoothie Bars
column14:
BLENDTEC CONNOISSEUR 825 SMOOTHIE BLENDER

 

Formerly Blendtec Q Series Blender

 

The Blendtec CONNOISSEUR 825 (Q SERIES) Commercial Blender & Smoothie Maker is our best selling smoothie maker, offering easy operation and one touch blending. Ideal for use in juice bars, milkshake bars, pubs, cocktail bars and restaurants. 

 

Perfect for high-volume shops, the Connoisseur 825 is a workhorse built with longevity in mind. The 3.8 peak horsepower motor easily powers through the toughest ingredients, like ice and frozen fruit, without skipping a beat. 

 

With the inbuilt 'No-Tend' technology, it features 30 pre-programmed blending profiles which are selected through the electronic keypad and are viewed on the blue LCD screen. Smoothies, milkshakes, frozen coffees and frappes are made perfectly every time.

 

 

Comes fitted with the new CONNOISSEUR Series sound enclosure which reduces the noise produced by this high powered blender by 50%.

  • Motor: 3.8 peak horsepower 7.5 amp - 240v available

column8: Birchall Earl Grey Prism Tea Bags
column13: At Pfunda, the tea bushes grow slowly, at high altitude and relatively low temperatures, developing greater flavour before they are individually picked and blended with a traditional Bergamot oil to give a distinctive flavour of citrus, with spicy floral
column14:
BIRCHALL EARL GREY TEA BAGS

 

Birchall Single Estate - Earl Grey Prism Tea Bags


Birchall Earl Grey is a scented pure origin tea grown exclusively at Rwanda’s leading tea estate.

 

The Pfunda Tea Estate is acknowledged as one of the most inspired and innovative tea gardens in East Africa, with a strict adherence to sustainable methods and a singular vision for producing exceptional tea without compromise.

 

At Pfunda, the tea bushes grow slowly, at high altitude and relatively low temperatures, developing greater flavour before they are individually picked and blended with a traditional Bergamot oil to give a distinctive flavour of citrus, with spicy floral notes. It really is perfection to a tea and we look forward to you enjoying it as much as we do.


Birchall consider their signature black teas to be truly special and unique in the tea world and we’d like to tell you why. Our black teas are all sourced exclusively from the finest tea estates across East Africa, from Rwanda through to the Great Rift Valley in Kenya; this is generally considered to be where the very best teas are to be found.

 

This equatorial region’s altitude, high rainfall and rich volcanic soil provide the ideal conditions that are integral to growing tea of unparalleled flavour and taste. It really is perfection to a tea and we look forward to you enjoying it as much as we do.

 

Recommended Brew Time;

  • 2-5 minutes

 

Ingredients;

  • Black Tea
    • Natural Bergamot Flavour
    • Cornflowers

column8: Simply Natural Coffee Syrups Starter Kit
column13: Everything You Need To Get You Going - 5 Amazing Vegetarian & Vegan Approved All Natural Syrups Complete With Pumps.
column14:
Simply Natural Coffee Syrups Starter Kit

 

With such a range of flavours that simply offer, we can give you this simply syrup starter kit.

 

Give your customers an exciting coffee experience and offer them a range of different coffees that may suit their needs.

 

Simply pick any 5 flavours, and we supply you with a pump for each of them!

 

A great way to introduce new flavours - at a great saving price too!

 

Top ten rules for using syrups in a café;


1. Adding a flavour for an extra charge doesn't work - create a drink!

 

2. Use strong visuals of the drink - a picture can beat a thousand words don’t forget :)

 

3. Put a name on the drink but be careful don't make it too poncy! Would you ask for an alpine topped mocha with swirl?

 

4. Unless you are in a very developed market for syrups don't display a long line on the back bar.

 

5. Fruit flavours generally don't work with hot drinks but can with cold. Unless designed for them; such as orange syrup & hot chocolate or forest fruits & hot chocolate (black forest hot chocolate)

 

6. Flavour your cream - vanilla is great in your general whipped cream and chocolate flavoured cream can add a premium to your hot chocolate. Here i am making the assumption that you are using a professional cream whipper not one of those horrid uht squirties.

 

7. Promote - have a free flavour friday occasionally. The investment will repay in repeat sales.

 

8. Do it properly - there is nothing worse than a drink either too heavily flavoured or not flavoured enough.

 

9. Charge a sensible mark up for your flavoured creations. At a cost of under 5p (if you are paying more you should be ordering from us – hey if you have got this far you should be ordering anyway! - See your syrups as a margin maximiser not as a deterrent.

 

10. Don't forget children - flavours work great in drinks for them. Raspberry syrup in a glass of sparkling water gives a great profit booster that’s far healthier than many soft drinks too!

column13: A blend of three high quality pure arabica coffees, producing a mellow, fragrant rounded coffee. - Our Best Selling Cafetiere Coffee
column14:
MILANO CAFETIERE COFFEE

100% ARABICA COFFEE

 

Our milano filter coffee, is a 100% arabica coffee blend of no less than 3 specially selected origin coffee's, this unique blend is bursting with brilliant aromas, this bean delivers a superb balance of flavour and body.

 

From premium origins such as Colombia, Nicaragua not to mention premium mysore coffee's this strategically formed and perfectly balanced cup will not dissapoint, Its medium roasting strength will not dissappoint and perfect for all day every day drinking...

 

PureGusto Coffee's

Not all coffees are one and the same, more importantly not all roasters are equal either!

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…   “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

          

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

column8: WMF 1500S Bean to Cup Coffee Machine
column13: The 1500S is a medium volume super automatic coffee machine, which produces real espresso based specialty coffee beverages, at the press of a button.
column14:
WMF 1500S

 

WMF 1500S BEAN TO CUP MACHINE

 

The WMF 1500S is a medium volume super automatic coffee machine, which produces real espresso-based speciality coffee beverages, at the press of a button. It is recommended for a daily volume of 180-200 beverages and features all of WMFs industry leading technologies and more.

 

A versatile unit with modular componentry, the 1500S excels in a multitude of environments. Whether it is an up market hotel bar, the QSR / Convenience environment or the corporate office block the WMF 1500s is the machine for your needs.

 

Based on the NEW GENERATION-Platform, the WMF 1500S coffee machine is the successor of previous top-seller coffee machine – the WMF Presto! As the subsequent model, the WMF 1500S coffee machine includes all of the great qualities of the previous models and improves upon them in many areas. The new design comes with a touch screen and optional EASY MILK-System for hot milk, hot milk foam and also cold milk, opens up entirely new opportunities for coffee specialities and top-quality chocolate.

 

With the Dynamic Milk System add-on, preparing the latest trendy specialities such as cold milk foam beverages, is just as much child’s play as creating the classic latte macchiato or cappuccino. Above all, the WMF1500S puts the yummy factor into gastronomy.

 

THE 1500S FEATURES

  • The WMF Easy Milk system gives you unparalleled milk foam and temperature consistency.
  • The WMF Plug&Clean fully automated and HACCP certified milk cleaning system.
  • A brandable 8″ touch display for individualised menu settings, instructional cleaning animations.
  • Independent brewing parameters for each coffee hopper.
  • Self aware system with customisable visual alerts and animations displayed to demonstrate solutions.
  • Self service functions with a locked menu
  • Data backup and updates through a USB stick

 

Various Model Options Available - Call Us Freephone To Discuss - 0800 644 6650

 

 

Easy upkeep

Basic maintenance tasks you will be able to carry out yourself. Making your machine a rare sight for the WMF service technician.

  

Eight beverage buttons over six levels

Up to 48 beverages in either single- or double sized cups can be programmed in.

 

Small-Medium-Large Functions

Each desired beverage is simply matched to the various predefined filling volumes.

 

Slim by design

Taking up lessons room thanks to its exceptionally sleek dimensions. This provides more installation options for the machine, as well as possible add-on combinations.

 

Steam Jet / Steam shower

Brings every cup to the correct temperature in a matter of seconds – for the finest quality coffee.

 

 

Clear signals

The illuminated side panels serve as visual indicators for operation modes.

column8: Boutique Double Wall Paper Coffee Cups & Lids
column13: Stunning design, smooth to the touch, impeccable insulation. Our latest launch in the paper cup market promises to be a huge success and is completely exclusive to PureGusto
column14:
BOUTIQUE DESIGN PAPER COFFEE CUPS

DOUBLE WALL COFFEE CUPS

 

At PureGusto our specialist team of product designers and market experts have been hard at work on this one for some time. A paper cup with sustainably sourced high grade paper fibres that not only feels smooth to the touch, but yields high grade insulation levels at the same time.

 

HOT COFFEE - COOL CUPS

PureGusto's "Heat Gap" Technology

 

We achieve this with our "heat gap" technology, providing a extra folded layer of sustainably sourced high grade paper fibres between the user and the inner cup layer itself. This provides excellent beverage insulation levels, keeping the coffee hotter, and the cup cooler for longer!

 

The design element was also a major aspect in the manufacturing process of this range, with such effort gone into sourcing the rich high paper fibres and its superior insulation technology, naturally the design of the cup itself needed to mirror its premium quality. The stunning clean cut digital printing process means the exquisite damask design its finished with is printed to the highest quality!

 

In summary, "boutique" is a cup range that evokes stunning clean printed damask designs, and establishes market superiority with its "heat gap" insulation technology.

 

The best part is the price, as this cup is produced exclusively in our authorised BRC accredited and ISO approved factory, theres no middle men, effectively coming direct the only source. Set your coffee shop, deli, restaurant, hotel, car show room, indeed any hot beverage serving establishment apart with a range of cups to match the quality of your business. 

 

 

Available In Three Sizes;

8oz

12oz

16oz

 

Lids Sold Seperately.

column13: Dark Italia's delectable flavours and strong aromatics shine through from bean to cup, This dark roast central and South American Arabica blend is our second best selling coffee, for those that like a stronger flavour.
column14:
FAIRTRADE DARK ITALIA COFFEE BEANS

 

PRODUCED BY AUTHORISED FAIRTRADE LICENCE HOLDER - BEWARE NON LICENCED RETAILERS

  

Our timeless classic dark roast coffee, this strong but yet smooth coffee has a truly distinctive taste and provides long lasting crema and intense aromatic. This expertly blended mix of single plantation South American Arabica coffee's and extremely high grade cleaned Robusta coffee's gives a perfectly balanced espresso blend

 

Due to the high roast of this particular blend we do not recommend it for use in automatic bean to cup machines.

  

PureGusto Coffee Beans

Not all coffees are one and the same, more importantly not all roasters are equal either!

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…     “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

           

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

  

PRODUCED BY AUTHORISED FAIRTRADE LICENCE HOLDER - BEWARE NON LICENCED RETAILERS

column13: Jura cappuccino frothers for quick and easy frothing - easy and profi foamers available.
column14:
Jura Cappuccino Milk Frothers

Jura Milk Foamers

 

Calling all cappuccino lovers! This JURA frother with revolutionary fine foam technology creates a finely textured milk foam with a long-lasting consistency.

 

Jura Easy Fine Foamer:

Inside the multichamber system the milk is drawn in, heated, and then frothed up with air. The result is a milk foam like no other, that caresses the palate and tongue and is ideal for decorating.

The fine foam frother is designed in the pure, elegant JURA style and can be used with all coffee machines equipped with a Connector System.

 

Jura Professional Fine Foamer:

The multifunctional frother is specially designed for the preparation of speciality coffees with milk and milk foam. You can use it to make delicious latte macchiato, cappuccino or hot milk and milk foam for hot chocolate – with perfect results every time. 

The first stage in the multichamber system froths the milk to professional barista standard. The revolutionary fine foam technology creates a finely textured milk foam with a long-lasting consistency, making every mouthful a pleasure for the palate and tongue.

 

In the second stage the milk is drawn in and then heated. Combined with superior quality coffee, this technology completely redefines the coffee experience. It’s a difference you can both see and taste.

The professional fine foam frother is designed in the pure, elegant JURA style and can be used with all coffee machines equipped with a Connector System.

column8: Signature - Great Taste Award Filter Sachets
column13: Signature is exactly that, our highest quality blend, the staple of which we rank other coffee's against. Our own personal sign off to the coffee making world!
column14:
SIGNATURE FILTER COFFEE

AWARD WINNING FILTER COFFEE

 

PureGusto signature blend is our flagship coffee, as its name would suggest, our signature coffee blend, carefully blended using hand picked arabica coffee's from no less than 5 different single origins, this complex and sophisticated award winning blend is our own personal sign off to the coffee making world.

 

A sophisticated drinking coffee that shines from the first taste to its last, long thick crema and tantalising aromas finish every cup as, a true signature coffee blend, and in this format has been ground using our unique ground flat bed technoology to create a fantastic filter coffee blend.

 

5 x 100% single origin Arabica coffees, carefully blended and convection roasted to sweet, smooth & rich perfection...

 

PureGusto Filter Coffee's

Not all coffees are one and the same, more importantly not all roasters are equal either!

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…   “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Great Taste Awards 2014 Double Star & 2015 Star Winner!

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

          

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

column13: JURA's F9 is powerful, attractive and easy to operate. One touch of a button is all it takes and your favourite coffee flows into the cup.
column14:
JURA F9

JURA IMPRESSA F9 PIANO BLACK

The Perfect One Touch: 14 specialities a single touch, from the classics to the trendy latte.

Create an inspiring range of coffee specialities at the touch of a button with the JURA F9. Delight with classics such as a ristretto, espresso, coffee, latte macchiato and cappuccino, or set the trend with a perfect flat white or the popular caffè latte. The timeless style of the award winning F-Line is embodied in the F9 with high quality materials and distinctive design - a highlight in any kitchen.

 

Whether it’s your morning espresso, a leisurely latte macchiato or the trendy flat white, with 14 different specialities the JURA F9 has something for every taste. And with eight aroma levels, you can further customise your coffee experience. Separate spouts for coffee, milk and hot water maintain absolute, TÜV-certified hygiene.

 

The perfect One Touch: 14 specialities at the touch of a button, from the coffee classic to the trendy flat white

Whether it’s your morning espresso, a leisurely latte macchiato or the trendy flat white, with 14 different specialities the JURA F9 has something for every taste. And with eight aroma levels, you can further customise your coffee experience. Separate spouts for coffee, milk and hot water maintain absolute, TÜV-certified hygiene.

TFT display with Rotary Selection

JURA’s TFT technology has found its way into the compact class. Simply turn the Rotary Switch and a list of speciality coffees appears on the 2,8" display. Simply touch the button for coffee that fulfils your wildest dreams. Four products can be individually programmed on the start screen and assigned any name.

Aroma+ grinder now twice as fast

By perfecting the cutting angle inside the grinding cone, the JURA engineers have managed to increase efficiency significantly. As a result, the perfect aroma can now be achieved in all its natural fullness in half the grinding time. So now coffee lovers can enjoy pure and perfect coffee indulgence with less preparation time and less noise. The powder chute for ground coffee can be used for additional coffee varieties such as a decaffeinated blend.

Ingenious dual spout with fine foam technology

The height-adjustable dual spout, which can range from 65 to 111 mm high on a continuous scale, features state-of-the-art fine foam technology. It creates airy, feather-light milk foam with an exceptionally high-quality consistency for the perfect cappuccino or latte macchiato, and is a breeze to dismantle and clean. Two separate pipe systems for coffee and milk guarantee perfect results and hygiene.

BLENDTEC JUGS

BLENDTEC J2 FOUR SIDED JARS

 

BLENDTEC FOURSIDE BPA FREE JUGS

 

When it came out, the FourSide jar revolutionized the world of commercial blending. Its square shape is much better at blending than traditional round jars. The jar also generates more friction, heating soups a little faster than does the WildSide jar. It’s also especially good for dry grinding and making smaller smoothies.

 

Blendtec Jugs (J2) have a capacity of 1.9L and are also BPA free. They are made from co-polyester material which means that they have a good chemical resistance. 

 

Product Key Features:

  • Comes with a 6 month warranty
  • Official Blendtec Branded Product

column13: EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT FROM PUREGUSTO SALE PRICE, The simple, compact design with its elegant combination of matt and gloss black gives the JURA C60 an imposing yet understated look in any surroundings.
column14:
Jura Impressa C60

 

Turn, press, enjoy – that’s how easy it is to enter the world of IMPRESSA! With the one-switch operating concept of the Rotary Switch and the 11-language plain text display, it’s easy to create the perfect coffee every time. Thanks to the high-performance conical grinder, the beans are always freshly ground.

 

The simple, compact design with its elegant combination of matt and gloss black gives the Jura C60 an imposing yet understated look in any surroundings.

 

 

Simple operation

Thanks to the one-switch operating concept of the smart Rotary Switch and the 11-language plain text display, you are just one touch of a button away from the perfect cup of coffee. The machine is also designed to be easy to program and care for.

 

 

Height-adjustable coffee spout

The height of the coffee spout can be adjusted between 2.6 - 4.4 inches to allow any size of cup to be used, from small espresso cups to large coffee cups. This prevents the coffee from splashing on the machine and produces a perfect, velvety crema.

 

 

Fine Foam Frother

The revolutionary fine foam technology ensures unique milk foam quality with a fine, feather-light consistency. It's the perfect way to give the finishing touch to your favourite beverages.

 

 

Compact Elegance

The IMPRESSA JURA C60 is a combination of striking clean lines, compact dimensions, high-quality materials and uncompromising workmanship. Compact enough to fit anywhere, it cuts a striking figure with matte and gloss surfaces in understated black.

column8: WMF 5000S Bean To Cup Coffee Machine
column13: The WMF 5000S is a high volume super automatic coffee machine, which produces real espresso based specialty coffee beverages, It is recommended for a daily volume of 400+ beverages
column14:
WMF 5000S

 

WMF 5000S COFFEE MACHINE

 

The WMF 5000S is a high volume super automatic coffee machine, which produces real espresso-based specialty coffee beverages, at the press of a button. It is recommended for a daily volume of 400+ beverages and features all of WMFs industry leading technologies and more.

 

The 5000S now features the new WMF Dynamic Milk system, which gives both hot and cold milk foam and several different foam types. Whether it is a busy conference centre, an up market hotel, the QSR environment or a busy office block the WMF 5000S is the versatile high volume coffee machine for your needs.

 

The WMF 5000S is our speciality machine for those who live life in the fast lane. It perfectly satisfies the need to provide the fullest range of indulgence and finest quality at maximum speed. Whenever and wherever you don't have time to wait for coffee specialities.

 

Consequently, the WMF5000S has an inbuilt recipe for success: The more indulgence created per hour, the greater your daily turnover. And that, you can count on.

 

THE 5000S FEATURES

  • WMF Dynamic Milk allows you to prepare hot and cold foamed milk drinks from the single machine, allowing you to increase your product line, with minimal staff training.
  • 8″ touch display for individualised menu settings, instructional cleaning animations
  • Multiple product hoppers – Coffee & soluble products
  • WMF Plug&Clean 2.0 – HACCP compliant milk system cleaning
  • Independent brewing temperatures for each coffee variety
  • New high-capacity grinders (4g/sec grind rate), which feature reduced grinding noise and are easy to adjust
  • Self-service functions with a brandable locked menu
  • Data backup, software updates, and cleaning protocol downloads via a USB stick

 

 

 

Dynamic Milk offers a full range of milk and milk foam creations – fully automatically. Speedy cleaning thanks to Clean in Place.

 

 

The heavy duty brewer and high performance pump ensure a long service life and peak performance.

 

 

The SteamJet brings every cup to the correct temperature in a matter of seconds.

 

 

Rapid hot milk and foam at the push of a button – or the classic way with Auto Steam or Easy Steam.

 

 

With its impressively sleek dimensions, this head-turner makes room for additional coffee machines or add-on devices.

 

 

Practical Small-Medium- Large functions (SML) simply match each desired beverage to the various predefined filling volumes.

 

 

Large, removable, lockable product hoppers. The coffee bean hoppers are dishwasher-proof. Ideal for easy cleaning.

 

 

Large touch display with self-explanatory “digital operating manual”. Automatic messages signalling current operation status.

 

 

Perfectly coordinated add-on and vending devices alleviate labor and boost performance.

 

 

Milk flexibly supplied from either left or right side, or underneath.

 

 

The illuminated side panels flash when action is required (e.g. when the coffee beans need refilling).

Expobar Monroc Coffee Machine

Monroc is an efficient espresso machine that fulfils all demands for a nice espresso in a simple and easy way. The user-friendly functions of the machine are based on well-tried technology and by skilful and professional craftsmen.

 

This means that Monroc is a reliable and solid machine that you can really trust, every day – year after year. Monroc is very suitable for smaller cafés and restaurants where you wish to serve espresso, cappuccino, caffé latte or other espresso based drinks.

 

Monroc is a two-group espresso machine with automatic water filling and a steam tank with a 11.5 litre capacity. Monroc has an electronic cup dosage in order to easily be able to pre-programme the required amount of water for various cup sizes.

 

FEATURES

  • Built-in volumetric motor pump, complete with two retention valves and solid particle filter
  • Copper boiler with heat exchanger per group and pressure relief valve
  • Group head with direct pre-infusion chamber
  • One steam arm and one hot water tap
  • Heating element low water level auto cut-off PULSER
  • Auto-fill water boiler CONTROL
  • 4 different programmable coffee doses per group

column13: Our Award Winning - Medium Strength - 100% Pure Arabica Coffee - Exceptionally Smooth With An Outstanding Aroma & Crema - 6 x 1 Kilo
column14:
100% ARABICA COFFEE BEANS

 

Precisely as its name would suggest, this specially selected 100% Arabica coffee bean blend is combination of pure Arabicas from around the world. The purity of 100% Arabica and the high grade crops used are complimented by a medium roast to ensure a truly balanced and impeccably smooth taste, first sip to the last.
  
100% Arabica coffees are not all the same, we've specially selected the high quality Arabicas in our blend to produce a coffee everyone can enjoy, all day, whatever the beverage. long lasting aromatic flavours with an outstanding crema.

 

 

PureGusto Coffee Beans

Not all coffees are one and the same, more importantly not all roasters are equal either!

 

PureGusto Coffees are the culmination of;

  • Some of the world’s finest coffee beans sourced from growers all over the world.
  • Years of blending knowledge from some of the leading industry roasting experts
  • Superior roasting using a unique state of the art convection coffee roaster here in the UK

 

The result…   “Simply, Remarkable Coffee.”

 

Is convection roasting really better quality or are we just blowing hot air? (excuse the pun)?

          

Convection roasting or air roasting is exactly how it sounds, smooth streams of hot air gently pass over the coffee beans until perfectly roasted. This creates a smooth and equally as important, an even roast, without any scorching or over-roasting usually associated with traditional drum roasters.

 

There are only a handful of commercial convection roasters in Europe, you’ve found one! Welcome to exceptionally smooth roasted coffee.

column13: These vegetarian approved - natural syrups come in elegantly styled 1 litre bottles, with over 50 varieties each one rich flavoured and will enhance your drinking experience whether it is a coffee, cocktails, smoothies, cappuccino or lattes....
column14:
SIMPLY COFFEE SYRUPS

Our Best Selling All Natural Coffee Syrup Range

 

High Concentrate = Better Flavour & Better Value

Simply syrups are perfect for coffee, cocktails, smoothies, shakes and much more.

 

With our MASSIVE range of simply coffee syrups, we are sure to have exactly what you desire. Simply are manufacturers and suppliers of food and beverage products primarily for food services to over 45 countries around the world. Whether you're just a small independent company or a large chain I'm sure with our simply range we can support you whatever your needs.

 

Have a look on the drop down box to just see how big our range really is ... And be sure to be adventurous as you can be. From a vanilla latte to a white chocolate mocha, our simply range gives you the opportunity to really widen your market of coffees.

 

 

Simply Coffee Syrups Key Features:

 

  • No Hydrogenated Fats
  • Halal Certified
  • Vegetarian Society Approved
  • Gluten Free
  • GMO free
  • No Artificial Colours
  • No Artificial Flavouring

 

 

Top Tips For Adding & Selling Syrups To Drinks!

Adding a flavour for an extra charge doesn't work - create a drink!

  1. Use strong visuals of the drink - a picture can beat a thousand words don’t forget :) 
  2. Put a name on the drink but be careful don't make it too poncy! Would you ask for an alpine topped mocha with swirl?
  3. Unless you are in a very developed market for syrups don't display a long line on the back bar.
  4. Fruit flavours generally don't work with hot drinks but can with cold. Unless designed for them; such as orange syrup & hot chocolate or forest fruits & hot chocolate (black forest hot chocolate)
  5. Flavour your cream - vanilla is great in your general whipped cream and chocolate flavoured cream can add a premium to your hot chocolate. Here I am making the assumption that you are using a professional cream whipper not one of those UHT squirts.
  6. Promote - have a free flavour Friday occasionally. The investment will repay in repeat sales. 
  7. Do it properly - there is nothing worse than a drink either too heavily flavoured or not flavoured enough.
  8. Charge a sensible mark up for your flavoured creations. At a cost of under 5p (if you are paying more you should be ordering from us – hey if you have got this far you should be ordering anyway! - See your syrups as a margin maximiser not as a deterrent.
  9. Don't forget children - flavours work great in drinks for them. Raspberry syrup in a glass of sparkling water gives a great profit booster that’s far healthier than many soft drinks too!

The Kenco singles machine offers a new modern and attractive design, and now with a fully proven mechanism it can combine its stylish look with a reliable performance. The new style brewer now boasts a few upgrades making it top of the range in its market:

  • Easier to read LCD screen are to help aid the person using it
  • The Kenco singles brewer can now be manually filled as well as plumbed in giving you the option for it to be placed wherever

 

All these features mean using the kenco singles brewer is even more simple and easier to maintain. Its quick and easy to use, just simply place your cup under the machine, insert your chosen flavour singles capsule and your drink will be served to you moments later.

column8: Jura Claris Water Filters - Claris White
column13: Jura Claris WHITE claris water filters with circular bottom fitting
column14:
Jura Claris Water Filters - Claris White

 

Firstly please ensure you check the bottom of your water tank for correct shape of filter for your machine. claris white = Circular bottom fitting.

 

Our claris white cartridge guarantees you a freshly filtered, pure-tasting water for your coffee or tea at all times. It is designed for the Jura coffee machines, it is coffee neutral and is placed directly inside the water tank. With this inside the tank it ensures that all the water before being passed through the machine is perfectly filtwered whilst also protecting the coffee machine.

 

Anyone who has ever drunk fresh spring water knows that there can be a world of difference between the pure elixir of life and the processed fluid that comes out of our taps. Use of CLARIS filter cartridges guarantees you freshly filtered, delicioustasting water for your tea and coffee at all times.

 

Designed especially for JURA automatic speciality coffee machines, it is coffee neutral and is placed directly in the water tank.
